Questions: Please describe the problems you've had.
Responses:
1) I didn't get the "DONE" after running the remotes installation. But I was able to do the rest of the preparation, so I think it worked at the end.
2) I was asked if I wanted to install a compiliation when running remotes::install_gitlab("rostools/r3", upgrade = TRUE), I pressed yes, and it took forever and didn't look like the video. So I STOPped it and ran it again and this time pressed no, and then it looked fine.
